title: MarketWatch - A Top Federal Reserve Official Discusses The Outlook
description: Greg Robb of MarketWatch's D.C. Bureau speaks with St. Louis Fed President James Bullard on the outlook for the economy and monetary policy and why he thinks the central bank should end its bond buying by March.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Greg Robb of MarketWatch's D.C. Bureau speaks with St. Louis Fed President James Bullard on the outlook for the economy and monetary policy and why he thinks the central bank should end its bond buying by March.
